name: Just In Time (Purple Puffer Productions)
description:
Controls:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space bar

Crouch: Left control (when unlocked)

Sprint: Left shift (when unlocked)

Details:

You are a minimum wage worker in a legally distinct rainforst company warehouse, and frankly you're paid too little to deal with this stress. But oh well! Do you best, because if any customer is mildly inconvenienced you will be immediately fired.

Good luck!

P.S. There is a WebGL build but it's got some big issues regarding the input system, textures and general performance; you can have a play around with it but I'd recommend downloading and running it locally if possible!
